entry.summary: 吴说获悉，据雷建平，比特小鹿上市后吴忌寒控制43.6%股权，有88.5%投票权。比特小鹿2019年、2020年、2021年营收分别为8877万美元、1.86亿美元、3.95亿美元；毛利分别为-1006.8万美元、-2317.7万美元、2.41亿美元。比特小鹿预计2022年营收3.3亿美元，净亏损为6240万美元。

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，Cobo 创始人神鱼在香港 Web3 嘉年华表示，2017年以来宏观对加密货币价格占主要因素，由于美国银行暴雷，宏观紧缩开始缓解，预计比特币减半效应仍然会在今年Q4开始显现。但神鱼表示，他从入行三个月就知道自己不擅长二级投资，因此分析均不作为投资建议。

entry.summary: 据 CoinDesk 报道，美国银行(BAC) 认为商品、货币和股票等现实世界资产的代币化是采用数字资产的关键驱动力。报告称，上个月代币化黄金市场价值超过 10 亿美元。“代币化黄金提供实物黄金敞口、24/7 实时结算、无管理费、无存储或保险费用，且去中心化使实物黄金所有权和价值的转移成为可能。”

entry.title: Amber Group考虑出售日本子公司，并计划在香港申请虚拟资产交易平台牌照。合伙人 Annabelle Huang 称，日本是一个“质量非常高的市场，但法规很严格”，而香港的...
entry.summary: Amber Group考虑出售日本子公司，并计划在香港申请虚拟资产交易平台牌照。合伙人 Annabelle Huang 称，日本是一个“质量非常高的市场，但法规很严格”，而香港的监管环境对其更有利。此前，Coinbase 和 Kraken 等交易所已退出日本市场。（彭博社） https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-04-14/crypto-s-amber-mulls-japan-unit-sale-will-seek-hong-kong-permit?leadSource=uverify%20wall https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1646811516413575169

entry.title: 吴说获悉，Vitalik 新博文用 ChatGPT 做了个有趣实验：在现实世界中，A点到B点之间所需时长与距离呈现怎样的比例关系？结果发现，似乎确实存在某种特定的关系，...
entry.summary: 吴说获悉，Vitalik 新博文用 ChatGPT 做了个有趣实验：在现实世界中，A点到B点之间所需时长与距离呈现怎样的比例关系？结果发现，似乎确实存在某种特定的关系，即所需时间接近距离的平方根。特别是当两点距离足够长时，结果出现更准确的线性拟合。

entry.title: Re There are a few projects claiming to provide defi privacy but are just a mere tornado fork underneath. However silent through its novel framework E...
entry.summary: Re There are a few projects claiming to provide defi privacy but are just a mere tornado fork underneath. However silent through its novel framework EZEE is able to provide anonymity and time-gapped confidentiality, which enables users to utilize any Web 3 application privately.

entry.title: Re Enter Silent Protocol, who is focused on providing privacy as a middleware solution for public blockchains. The project looks to solve this problem...
entry.summary: Re Enter Silent Protocol, who is focused on providing privacy as a middleware solution for public blockchains. The project looks to solve this problem by providing privacy preservation at the application level via an SDK. https://t.co/M8MGkMwPL8

entry.title: Re But as blockchain usage increases, especially for crypto native institutions or businesses looking to enter the space, compliant privacy of blockch...
entry.summary: Re But as blockchain usage increases, especially for crypto native institutions or businesses looking to enter the space, compliant privacy of blockchain transactions will be of rising importance both from a security and a safety perspective.

entry.title: Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If ...
entry.summary:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both…
il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update: This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
